${ModID}:HarvestCrops.NAME: Harvest Crops
${ModID}:HarvestCrops.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the last card played this turn wasn't an Attack, play a copy of it. If it was a Power, Exhaust.

${ModID}:Hydroponics.NAME: Hydroponics
${ModID}:Hydroponics.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each Non-Attack played this turn.

${ModID}:Mechanize.NAME: Mechanize
${ModID}:Mechanize.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] for each other card of a different type in your hand. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:Mechanize.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] for each other card of a different type in your hand.

${ModID}:SeedVault.NAME: Seed Vault
${ModID}:SeedVault.DESCRIPTION: Next turn, gain a copy of the next Attack or Skill you play this turn. NL It costs 0 and has Exhaust.

${ModID}:OutToMarket.NAME: Out To Market
${ModID}:OutToMarket.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! damage to ALL enemies and gain !${ModID}:m2! Block the first time you play each card type each turn.

${ModID}:GeneticallyModified.NAME: Genetically Modified
${ModID}:GeneticallyModified.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Choose 1 of !M! Uncommon Power cards to add to your hand. It costs 1 less. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:GeneticallyModified.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Choose 1 of !M! Uncommon Power cards to add to your hand. It costs 1 less.

${ModID}:InSeason.NAME: In Season
${ModID}:InSeason.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Flurry: Gain !${ModID}:m2! *Plated *Armor if the card was an Attack. Otherwise, gain !M! Strength. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:InSeason.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL ${ModID}:Flurry: Gain !${ModID}:m2! *Plated *Armor if the card was an Attack. Otherwise, gain !M! Strength. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:SupplyChain.NAME: Supply Chain
${ModID}:SupplyChain.DESCRIPTION: Gain a *Fertilizer at the start of each turn.
${ModID}:SupplyChain.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Gain a *Fertilizer at the start of each turn.

${ModID}:SowTheSeeds.NAME: Sow The Seeds
${ModID}:SowTheSeeds.DESCRIPTION: Gain a *Fertilizer. NL Fetch !M! random cards with different types from your draw pile.

${ModID}:TillTheEarth.NAME: Till The Earth
${ModID}:TillTheEarth.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain a *Fertilizer NL Next turn, gain a *Fertilizer.
